original_text: Joshua did to them as the Lord had directed: He hamstrung their horses and burned their chariots.
korean_text: 여호수아가 여호와께서 자기에게 명령하신 대로 행하여 그들의 말 뒷발의 힘줄을 끊고 그들의 병거를 불로 살랐더라

sentences.original_text: Joshua did to them as the Lord had directed
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아가 그들에게 여호와께서 지시하신 대로 행하였으니
